explains: v. 证明，证实；给……颁发合格证书；证明（某人）患有精神病；保证

sentences.en: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
sentences.cn: 每年他们都会审核我们的账目，以证明其准确合理。

sentences.en: The National Election Council is supposed to certify the results of the election.
sentences.cn: 国家选举委员会将为选举结果作证。

sentences.en: We can certify for his honesty.
sentences.cn: 我们可以保证他的诚实。
